languages.text: "Сегодня же жители Даргонуса узрят последнее покаяние Его Преосвященства. Пыточных дел мастера позаботятся, чтобы прошение этого святого человека было исполнено в точности".
"Today, the people of Dargonus will behold the cardinal's last penance. Master torturers will make sure that this holy man's request is fulfilled to the letter."
languages.original_text: "Сегодня же жители Даргонуса узрят последнее покаяние Его Преосвященства. Пыточных дел мастера позаботятся, чтобы прошение этого святого человека было исполнено в точности".

traits.locale_text: "Today, the people of Dargonus will behold His Holiness's last penance. Master torturers will make sure that this holy man's request is fulfilled to the letter."
"Today, the people of Dargonus will behold His Holiness's last penance. Master torturers will make sure that this holy man's request is fulfilled to the letter."
"Today, the people of Dargonus will behold His Holiness's last penance. Master torturers will make sure that this holy man's request is fulfilled to the letter."
"Today, the people of Dargonus will behold His Holiness's last penance. Master torturers will make sure that this holy man's request is fulfilled to the letter."
"Today, the people of Dargonus will behold the cardinal's last penance. Master torturers will make sure that this holy man's request is fulfilled to the letter."
"Today, the people of Dargonus will behold the cardinal's last penance. Master torturers will make sure that this holy man's request is fulfilled to the letter."

languages.text: "Heute wird das Volk von Dargonus Zeuge der letzten Strafe des Kardinals. Meisterfolterknechte werden dafür sorgen, dass die Bitte dieses heiligen Mannes exakt erfüllt wird."
languages.original_text: "Today, the people of Dargonus will behold the cardinal's last penance. Master torturers will make sure that this holy man's request is fulfilled to the letter."

traits.locale_text: "Heute wird das Volk von Dargonus Zeuge der letzten Strafe des Kardinals. Meisterfolterknechte werden dafür sorgen, dass die Bitte dieses heiligen Mannes exakt erfüllt wird."
"Heute wird das Volk von Dargonus Zeuge der letzten Strafe Seiner Eminenz. Meisterfolterknechte werden dafür sorgen, dass die Bitte dieses heiligen Mannes exakt erfüllt wird."

languages.text: « Aujourd'hui, le peuple de Dargonus sera témoin de l'ultime pénitence du cardinal. Les maîtres tortionnaires veilleront à ce que la requête de ce saint homme soit exécutée à la lettre. »
languages.original_text: "Today, the people of Dargonus will behold the cardinal's last penance. Master torturers will make sure that this holy man's request is fulfilled to the letter."

traits.locale_text: « Aujourd'hui, le peuple de Dargonus sera témoin de l'ultime pénitence du cardinal. Les maîtres tortionnaires veilleront à ce que la requête de ce saint homme soit exécutée à la lettre. »
« Aujourd'hui, le peuple de Dargonus sera témoin de l'ultime pénitence de Son Éminence. Les maîtres tortionnaires veilleront à ce que la requête de ce saint homme soit exécutée à la lettre. »

languages.text: “今天，达戈努斯全体臣民都会亲眼见证红衣主教最后的忏悔。众多刑讯大师会保证这位圣人的要求彻底得到满足。”
languages.original_text: "Today, the people of Dargonus will behold the cardinal's last penance. Master torturers will make sure that this holy man's request is fulfilled to the letter."

traits.locale_text: “今天，达戈努斯全体臣民都会亲眼见证红衣主教最后的忏悔。众多刑讯大师会保证这位圣人的要求彻底得到满足。”
“今天，达戈努斯全体臣民都会亲眼见证主教大人最后的忏悔。众多刑讯大师会保证这位圣人的要求彻底得到满足。”
“今天，达戈努斯全体臣民都会亲眼见证主教大人最后的忏悔。众多刑讯大师会保证这位圣人的要求彻底得到满足。”

languages.text: «Hoy, la gente de Dargonus presenciará la última penitencia del cardenal. Los maestros torturadores se asegurarán de cumplir con la voluntad del santo al pie de la letra».
languages.original_text: "Today, the people of Dargonus will behold the cardinal's last penance. Master torturers will make sure that this holy man's request is fulfilled to the letter."

traits.locale_text: «Hoy, la gente de Dargonus presenciará la última penitencia del cardenal. Los maestros torturadores se asegurarán de cumplir con la voluntad del santo al pie de la letra».
«Hoy, la gente de Dargonus presenciará la última penitencia de Su Eminencia. Los maestros torturadores se asegurarán de cumplir con la voluntad del santo al pie de la letra».

languages.text: 「今日、ダルゴナスの民は枢機卿猊下の最後の懺悔を目の当たりにする。名高き拷問師たちが、この聖人の願いを一字一句漏らさず確実に果たす」
languages.original_text: "Today, the people of Dargonus will behold the cardinal's last penance. Master torturers will make sure that this holy man's request is fulfilled to the letter."

traits.locale_text: 「今日、ダルゴナスの民は枢機卿猊下の最後の懺悔を目の当たりにする。名高き拷問師たちが、この聖人の願いを一字一句漏らさず確実に果たす」
「今日、ダルゴナスの民は枢機卿猊下の最後の懺悔を目の当たりにする。名高き拷問師たちが、この聖人の願いを一字一句漏らさず確実に果たす」

languages.text: "Bugün Dargonus ahalisi, kardinalin nihai kefaretine şahitlik edecek. Mahir işkenceciler, bu kutsal adamın arzusunu harfi harfine yerine getirecek."
languages.original_text: "Today, the people of Dargonus will behold the cardinal's last penance. Master torturers will make sure that this holy man's request is fulfilled to the letter."

traits.locale_text: "Bugün Dargonus ahalisi, kardinalin nihai kefaretine şahitlik edecek. Mahir işkenceciler, bu kutsal adamın arzusunu harfi harfine yerine getirecek."
"Bugün Dargonus ahalisi, Sayın Kardinal'in nihai kefaretine şahitlik edecek. Mahir işkenceciler, bu kutsal adamın arzusunu harfi harfine yerine getirecek."
